enhanced_description: The International HR Institute (IHRI) is a leading professional organization established in 2012 and headquartered in Manila, Philippines. Dedicated to professional development and lifelong learning, IHRI aims to be Southeast Asia's center of excellence in shaping the future of the HR management profession. Through its programs, which include certifications, courses, and degrees, IHRI focuses on accelerating skill development, enhancing learning efficiency, and ensuring training effectiveness for HR professionals. The institute emphasizes continuous learning to equip individuals with the latest knowledge and skills needed to stay competitive and succeed in the evolving HR landscape.
